definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The runner was tackled at the line of scrimmage.
sentences.chinese: 奔跑的隊員在爭球線附近被擒住。
